extendedInfo.description: A simple (but accurate) way to calculate a car loan and lease. It contains calculators for:- Auto Loan- Loan Affordability- Car LeaseThese give you a detailed break down of your loan and lease.It also allows you to compare your loan at different interest rates and terms

reviews.comment: Great app! Needs option to save to SD card. Also, a nicer GUI wouldn\'t hurt.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Really helped keep salesman honest. Once he realized I was checking his offers, a lease was quickly negotiated.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app, helpful when shopping for a car for sure. We just used to compare rates, down payment & loan amounts. It came in handy when negotiating!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A simple, effective, non-intrusive app!
reviews.comment: Works better than the USAA app AND without having to stick its fingers into every facet of your phone too! This app is simple, effective and non-intrusive - I recommended it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: ultra efficient and works super well. highly recommend. -HTC EVO
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Small Defect spotted...
reviews.comment: There is a small bug on your compare rates. It shows the down payment as a percent not a dollar amount. Otherwise the tool works as expected.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Please allow specifying Comparison rates and display total loan amount on main screen. Prefer BiShiNews Financial Calculator in the meantime
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t handle tablet screen sizing.
reviews.comment: Shows as a tiny unreadable rectangle.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its ok...
reviews.comment: Clean n easy. But there are few things missing in the equation.  Lic fee, doc fee, smog, smog cert fee. Some fees are taxable n some are not
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Used this app extensively shopping for a new car. Absolutely helped. Dealer came out @ 340 a mth and I got to 270 guided by apps #\'s. Loved it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work at all on a Samsung Nexus phone
reviews.comment: I\'d like to give it zero but there\'s no option for that. It doesn\'t work at all on my Samsung Nexus phone. The display is rendered off screen so you can\'t see or use anything.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Used this app this weekend while car shopping. Works like a charm.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Calculator makes up some \"dreamy\" monthly rates... if you think you would pay $3 & some change for $24,000 car loan 4 36 months, then this is app 4 u.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I just used this when buying a new car. It was great!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great info
reviews.comment: Gives all the info i need and more theni expected. Great app easy to use and put in your own info
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.comment: Works perfect on my galaxy nexus. Easily figure approximate payments and interest. App is perfect!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Should have ability to compare different terms not just rates for a specific loan.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Interesting. Does what it says. Just fill in the blanks and it does the rest. I would recommend it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too many buttons to click on
reviews.comment: Number pad does not automatically pull up. MAKES you enter value in EVERY field (trade in, etc). 3 times longer than other apps to get answer
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app!! Helped me know exactly what I was getting into when I bought my new car.
reviews.author: A Google User
